channel.title: How to change bonuses of a item? ~~~ max ~~~
channel.description:
how do i change bonuses of a item ?
i want leather body 5 str bonus ~~~ how?
~~~ max ~~~

item.title: How to change bonuses of a item? ~~~ max ~~~
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

I believe the second to last number in the list in item.cfg is the one for the strength bonus. Just change it to whatever.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change bonuses of a item? ~~~ max ~~~

item.title: How to change bonuses of a item? ~~~ max ~~~
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

[quote=“Darkomania, post:2, topic:86756”]its very easy

  1. clic on hybridscape

  2. clic on item ( fichier cfg )

  3. ctrl + f type Ex: verac
    4)item = 4753 wooot Verac_the_Defiled’s_helm. 63377.3753241266 63377.3753241266 83312.2081494279 0 [font=Verdana]0 0 6 2 550 580 540 0 56 50 53[/font]
    you can change that ^^^^^not the real

  4. clic run and you got it !!![/quote]
    You need to compile before running it.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change bonuses of a item? ~~~ max ~~~

item.title: How to change bonuses of a item? ~~~ max ~~~

item.description:
@Darkomania wrote:

its very easy

  1. clic on hybridscape

  2. clic on item ( fichier cfg )

  3. ctrl + f type Ex: verac
    4)item = 4753 wooot Verac_the_Defiled’s_helm. 63377.3753241266 63377.3753241266 83312.2081494279 0 [font=Verdana]0 0 6 2 550 580 540 0 56 50 53[/font]
    you can change that ^^^^^not the real

  4. clic run and you got it !!!
